entry.string:
Git committer email: diff --git a/Jenkinsfile b/Jenkinsfile index 534c6b3..bba590d 100644 --- a/Jenkinsfile +++ b/Jenkinsfile @@ -23,10 +23,7 @@ pipeline{ stage('Detect new folder'){ steps{ script{ - GIT_COMMIT_EMAIL = sh ( - script: 'git diff $GIT_COMMIT $GIT_PREVIOUS_SUCCESSFUL_COMMIT', - returnStdout: true - ).trim() + GIT_COMMIT_EMAIL = checkout([$class: 'GitSCM', branches: [[name: '*/master']], extensions: [], userRemoteConfigs: [[url: 'https://github.com/hxk1633/Microservices-Project']]]) echo "Git committer email: ${GIT_COMMIT_EMAIL}" }
diff --git a/wi.txt b/ty.txt similarity index 100% rename from wi.txt rename to ty.txt diff --git a/wy.txt b/wy.txt new file mode 100644 index 0000000..e69de29
